review: I love the firestick.  We only have a tv antenna now and wifi in the house.  We are saving over $100 a month by shutting off cable and/or satellite.  There are lots of options with firestick.
author: P. Foster

review: I'm reserving that last star, going with four stars initially, because I'm still exploring all the available content on my new Firestick since I've not yet had it even a week.  So far, I'm finding lots of movies and TV shows and music videos to watch, and music to listen to, as well.  The only drawback I can find thusfar is that HBOGo and ShowtimeAnytime require a subscription to a TV service in order to access them on the Firestick.  Like many people nowadays, I'm trying to cut the cable, not tie myself back to it again.  So, when will Firestick offer these now exclusive subscription services on Firestick for a fee, just like NetFlix, HuluPlus and AmazonPrime?  I'm very happy with my Firestick, otherwise, and can hardly wait to explore it further!!!  It's an amazing little gadget, opening a world of entertainment!!!
author: B. A. Davis

review: Hadn't had it a year, bought it at best buy and the plug almost caught fire. It was something we used daily and enjoyed, but now I'm afraid to get a new one fearing it may do the same thing.

review: Enjoying being able to access games, movies, music, photos, videos, etc. from the TV!

review: Doesn't seem to work nearly as well as our roku. The wifi gets stuck a lot and lags. And a roku plugged into the same TV has no issues.

This drawback means I won;t use the fire TV stick very much, but I don;t plan on returning it.
